section.title: UCC integration packages
section.simpara: This section lists all changes to ucc integration packages, i.e. packages that are installed on Univention Corporate Server.

listitem.simpara: Improved image toolkit support for image joinscripts with sequence numbers. Image joinscripts created since this version will be created with a 95[filename] prefix (Bug 32136).
Updated example files for rev3 images (Bug 32136).

section.title: UCC client packages
section.para: Information about errata updates released for UCC clients can be found at
